Package utilities

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LoadBranches
    The LoadStaffs class loads Branch data from the CSV database.
    LoadData<T>
    The LoadData class is an abstract class that loads data from CSV files It is inherited by classes that load data for different entities such as Staff, Branch, Order and MenuItem
    LoadMenuItems
    The LoadStaffs class loads MenuItem data from the CSV database.
    LoadOrders
    The LoadOrders class loads Order data from the CSV database.
    LoadStaffs
    The LoadStaffs class loads Staff data and corresponding passwords from the CSV database.
    Logger
    This class should be used for logging messages in the project
    PathTracker
    The PathTracker class is used to keep track of the pages navigated by the user
    PersistenceHandler
    This class is used to handle data persistence between multiple instances of the FOMS application.
    SerialiseCSV
    The SerialiseCSV class is used to read and write data to CSV files
    Session
    This class acts as a data store and contains all active entities within the runtime of the programme (i.e.
    TimeHandler
    This class contains methods that handle time-related operations This class is used to check if the customer has collected their order within the time limit
    UserInputHelper
    This class contains methods that handle user input This class is necessary to ensure that user input is handled correctly and consistently
